alert.note: Alert for Colorado (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 10:29PM CDT until April 20 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: The National Weather Service in League City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Colorado County in southeastern Texas... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1027 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles north of Weimar, or 8 miles southeast of La Grange, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Columbus and Frelsburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
